connector.description:
Send data to a Google Big Query table.

It is expected the body is in Json format representing an object or an array of objects.

The credentialsFileLocation property needs to be a path to a service account key file.

camel.kamelet.google-bigquery-sink.crede.name: camel.kamelet.google-bigquery-sink.credentialsFileLocation
camel.kamelet.google-bigquery-sink.crede.description: The credential to access Google Cloud Platform api services
